thread.title: Mr Robert Goldring
thread.title_full: www.watchfinder.co.uk reviewed by Mr Robert Goldring

author: Mr Robert Goldring
title: Mr Robert Goldring
text:
Watchfinder did an excellent job of dealing with my requests for sizing and delivery.My Omega is perfect for an 11 year old watch, it looks like new,and fits like a glove.
I have no hesitation in recommending them to anybody.
